name: rudbeckia

a garden plant with large yellow, orange, or red flowers with a dark circle in the middle. There are many different types of rudbeckia, including black-eyed Susans: Annual or perennial rudbeckias are dazzling in full sun. The display includes Rudbeckia as well as dahlias and salvias.
another word for
black-eyed Susan : Many of these late-summer yellow flowers are daisy-like in form - rudbeckias, or black-eyed Susans, are a favourite. Popular plants that originated in these regions include black-eyed Susan, Rudbeckia.
